name: Sick Love - An RPG Maker Novel
name_original: Sick Love - An RPG Maker Novel
description:
A short visual novel about Miguel, a boy whose dream is finding love, Fernando, a boy who seems to be an enchanted prince, and Júlio, a young man who falls in love with both of them. Created on "RPG Maker", you'll watch how these three boys get to know each other, fall in love and how a tragedy marks this unique relationship.

Features:
  • A visual novel about the relationship of three young boys;
  • Can be completed in one session (Playtime approximately 30 minutes - including all finals);
  • Four different endings;
  • A game without a fight;
  • Simple and easy gameplay;
